item.ptxt: Confirm the sheet thickness, tensile strength, and existence of the zinc treatment of both sides, and set the welder to conform to the welding conditions by referring to Front Body Construction.
Welding symbols (The welding symbols with dashed lines have a meaning of the spot welding of the part which is not visible)
L and L*=Welding length; unit: mm (in)

s1.ptxt: Cut the new front side frame and the front side backplate to align them with the body side of the front side frame and the front side backplate.
Weld the new bulkhead support (A) and the bumper beam patch (B) to the front portion of the new front side frame (C). Tack weld the bumper beam extension bracket (D).
Tack weld the new front side frame and the front side baclplate to the body.
Clamp the bulkhead parts, and check the body dimensions:

ptxt.sie-ref04: Engine compartment and front floor, under view

s1.ptxt: Temporarily install the front bumper beam, and check the front side frame and the bumper beam extension bracket positions.

Temporarily install the front fender and the hood, then check for differences in level and clearance. Check the external parts fitting positions. If necessary, check the headlight and the front bumper positions. Make sure the body lines flow smoothly.
Do the main welding.Weld the front portion of the new front side frame (A), the front side backplate (B), the bumper beam extension bracket (C), and the bumper beam patch (D).
L*: Welding positions with MPa or higher parts. Confirm the butt welding conditions.
